definition: entire book/unabridged book/entire multi-volume work/comprehensive volume
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
Siku Quanshu (collection of books compiled during Qing dynasty)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Da4 Bai3 ke1 Quan2 shu1 Chu1 ban3 she4
containing_words.word: 中国大百科全书出版社

sentences.english: The encyclopedia thudded onto the floor.
sentences.chinese: 那本百科全书砰地掉在地板上。

sentences.english: "I could look in the encyclopedia, " she said to herself.
sentences.chinese: “我可以去查百科全书，”姗姗自言自语道。
一个在线协作的百科全书。

sentences.english: This book is really Juliette's story, told in the third person.
sentences.chinese: 全书实际上是以第三人称叙述了朱丽叶的故事。

sentences.english: They were still driving away at the encyclopaedia.
sentences.chinese: 他们仍在孜孜不倦地编写那部百科全书。

sentences.english: An encyclopedia embraces a great number of subjects.
sentences.chinese: 一部百科全书包含许多学科。
我们买了一套多媒体百科全书。

sentences.english: We tabbed him as a walking encyclopaedia.
sentences.chinese: 我们管他叫活百科全书。

sentences.english: See also the Muggle Encyclopedia entry for the Wye River.
sentences.chinese: 参见《麻瓜百科全书》里关于瓦伊河的词条。

sentences.english: Throughout the book, the authors link each technique back to the PSIs that the technique influences.
sentences.chinese: 通读全书，作者将每一项技术都链接到PSI。

sentences.english: You will find the explanation in the encyclopedia .
sentences.chinese: 你可以在百科全书中找到解释。

sentences.english: I'll look it up in the encyclopaedia .
sentences.chinese: 我将在百科全书中查阅它。

sentences.english: They are, in essence, the database owners of these encyclopedias.
sentences.chinese: 他们在本质上是这些百科全书的数据库所有者。

sentences.english: The only Es were the four in his name on the cover.
sentences.chinese: 全书只有书皮上他的名字中有四个字母E。

sentences.english: A library is like an encyclopedia.
sentences.chinese: 一个图书馆就是一个大百科全书。

sentences.english: There are 43 lessons, covering everything from syntax to coding guidelines and code optimization.
sentences.chinese: 全书共43节课，涉及编码句法指导和代码优化。

definition: author's preface/autobiographical notes as introduction to a book
a series of books/a collection of books
(often used in book or chapter titles) general introduction/overview
start of literary work/opening song of ballad in Tanci style 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2]
name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
novel in chapters, main format for long novels from the Ming onwards, with each chapter headed by a summary couplet
